name: LM35
notes: Temperature sensor that outputs 10mV/°C. Requires 5V supply.

name: AT89C51
notes: Standard 8051 microcontroller with 4KB Flash, 128 bytes RAM

name: LED
notes: Requires current limiting resistor, typical forward voltage 1.8-3.3V depending on color

name: Resistor
notes: Common values: 220Ω for LED current limiting, 10kΩ for pull-up/pull-down

name: Crystal
notes: Typical values for 8051: 11.0592 MHz or 12 MHz

name: Capacitor
notes: Typical values: 22pF for crystal circuit, 10µF for power filtering

name: DC_Motor
notes: Typically requires driver circuit like L293D for control from microcontroller

name: L293D
notes: Dual H-bridge motor driver, can drive two DC motors, requires 5V logic supply and motor supply voltage

name: ADC0804
notes: 8-bit ADC, can be interfaced with 8051 for analog readings like LM35 temperature sensor
